messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Celebrate everything...especially U2
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/24/2004 7:39:51 PM Mountain Standard Time, danielle.conger@comcast.net writes: Watching him right now as Aragorn and thinking that
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/24/2004 7:39:51 PM Mountain Standard Time,
danielle.conger@... writes:
Watching him right now as Aragorn and thinking that Faramir would have
made a much better Professor Lupin in Harry Potter 3.
---------

They only hired Brits for Harry Potter, and the guy who plays Faramir is
Australian, I think.

David Thewlis, who plays Lupin, was wonderful in Seven Years in Tibet. (And
some other things, but I most like him in that role.)

Sandra


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Celebrate everything...especially U2
messages.msgSnippet: = ***Bono is one of my enduring icons of what it is to be fully human, spiritual and artistic all rolled into one.*** I agree!! I think the above phrase also
messages.messageBody:
=

***Bono is one of my enduring icons of what it is to be fully human,
spiritual and artistic all rolled into one.***

I agree!!

I think the above phrase also applies to my favorite icon of all
time...Viggo Mortenson. sigh......

Ren

=======

Watching him right now as Aragorn and thinking that Faramir would have
made a much better Professor Lupin in Harry Potter 3.

--Danielle

http://www.danielleconger.com/Homeschool/Welcomehome.html
